title: Collaborative Online Learning Design Workshop: Science Curriculum Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online learning tools and possession of specialized knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Learners, who are STEM majors or pre-researchers, will validate their collaborative competencies through project-based assessment. Practical sessions are conducted using personal devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design one online science education module through a two-week rapid prototyping process
Participants can develop assessment rubrics incorporating learner engagement strategies using various digital tools
Team members can improve the pedagogical effectiveness of online learning materials by over 80% through iterative feedback processes

resources: Digital Resource Database for Science Subjects

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
